scripts.dev: npx concurrently -n "SERVEUR,SVELTE,JEKYLL,BDD,MIGRE" "node --watch --import tsx --env-file .env ./back/src/serveur.ts" "npm run watch --prefix front/lib-svelte" "sleep 3 && jekyll build -s ./front -d ./front/_site -w" "docker compose up db" "sleep 3 && npm run migre-bdd"
scripts.lint: npx concurrently -n "SERVEUR,SVELTE" "npm run lint --prefix back" "npm run lint --prefix front/lib-svelte"
scripts.test: npx concurrently -n "SERVEUR,SVELTE" "npm run test --prefix back" "npm run test --prefix front/lib-svelte"
